title: At the court at White-hall, the 13th of July, 1682, present the King's Most Excellent Majesty, &c. His Majesty having been informed by the lord mayor, and other divers of aldermen of London, that the disorders and riots arisen in that city ...
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
notes: Other title information taken from first three lines of text.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
